subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Chris John made a 17th defense of his W.B.A. super world featherweight title, unanimously outpointing Chonlatarn Piriyapinyo in a slugfest in Singapore.
snippet: Chris John made a 17th defense of his W.B.A. super world featherweight title, unanimously outpointing Chonlatarn Piriyapinyo in a slugfest in Singapore.
